entry.content: Plus a look at their magical home, Casa Madrigal The next set of cards for Disney Lorcana is heavily inspired by The Little Mermaid. entry.content: Image: Slavic Magic/Hooded Horse On dimidiation and burgage plots Do you know what dimidiation is? Unless you happen to be a scholar of medieval heraldry, you probably don‚Äôt. It‚Äôs an older method of combining two or more coats of arms into a single shield to denote a union of, say, two families. In dimidiation, the two coats of arms would be cut down the middle, so you might end up with a shield featuring a griffin‚Äôs head stuck to a horse‚Äôs rear. Later on, it became more common to simply featu...
